name: Jia Li
routine: Jia Li typically sleeps at 11:30 pm and wakes at 6:30 am to practice tai chi.
occupation: She manages a traditional Chinese medicine clinic and works from 8 am to 6 pm.
thoughts: Lately, she's been pondering about ways to integrate technology into her practice to reach more people, especially after reading a relevant article on February 1st, 2024.
lifestyle: Jia Li enjoys a balance of yin and yang in her diet, practices meditation, and always brews herself a pot of oolong tea while working.

name: Ethan Ngugi
routine: Ethan Ngugi generally goes to sleep at 1am and wakes up at 10am, as his university classes start late.
occupation: Ethan Ngugi is an architecture student and works part-time at a local design studio.
thoughts: Ethan Ngugi is excited about a design competition he entered, with results being announced on February 3rd.
lifestyle: Ethan Ngugi is very active on social media and enjoys urban exploration with his friends in their free time.

name: Leila Zahra
routine: Leila is a night owl, often sleeping at 2am and waking up at 10am, just in time for her college classes.
occupation: She's an undergraduate studying International Relations with a keen interest in humanitarian work.
thoughts: Leila has been excited about the Model UN event scheduled for February 2nd, 2024, where she will represent her views on global peace.
lifestyle: She enjoys a vibrant dorm life, is always eager to try out new cuisines, and stays active by participating in campus social events.
